data.name: SCP: Abhorrent
data.detailed_description:
Play as Agent Sigma, an operative assigned to a GOC assessment team. In a mission to exterminate an uncontained SCP-363 instance located in an abandoned mining tunnel - the situation suddenly goes critical. With communication broken and fellow agents now assumed KIA/MIA, Agent Sigma's new objective is simply to escape alive.

Utilize fluorescent spray-paint to mark your progress, a motion-tracking camera to peer through walls, and a flamethrower to torch SCP-363 instances. If it comes down to the last draw, accurate aim with your sidearm might be your last resort. Survive and scavenge for ammunition and supplies - find the ladder and escape the tunnels.

Game Features:
• Built in Unreal Engine 4.
• Fully Procedurally Generated Map. Every playthrough is completely random each time you play, catering to a unique experience for every player.
• No saves. An unforgiving gameplay experience, death means restarting again from the beginning.
• Original Voice Acting, Soundtracks, and 3D Art Assets.

Game Updates and Future Content:
SCP: Abhorrent will have future patch releases for bug-fixes and additional game content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2160 / AMD C-50 1ghz, 1 core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3GHZ, 4 Cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 9600 / AMD RADEON 6250HD
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 128 GB available space
